text: Trudie Goodwin was born 13 November, 1951 in Lewisham, London. She is a British actress who played June Ackland in The Bill from 1983 to 2007 and Georgia Sharma in Emmerdale from 2011 to 2015. She has also guest starred in Heartbeat, The Good Doctor and Doctors. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:British actors
title: Trudie Goodwin
